title: Not getting Champion Mastery points on ARAM?
body: I'm pretty sure this last patch added champion mastery points to aram, unless I read that wrong. I played 2 games and didn't get any points. Before you queue it does say it's enabled in the game mode but at the end of the game it says they're unavailable.

replies.body:
"Champ Masteryâ€™s making its way to Howling Abyss and Twisted Treeline over the course of 6.12!"
Meaning not initially. They put that in lighter italicized text, so i kind of ignored it myself the first time i read the notes.
Yep, this is correct. Unfortunately, I don't have a time as to when it's going to turn on. ;_;
It went on quite a few hours ago for ARAM, actually. I managed an S rank on Rumble already. :)
